name: Bonbon and the Deep Below 🐇
description:
Bonbon and the Deep Below

Help Bonbon the hare 🐇 flee this mechanical nightmare! Go deeper and deeper into the ground to escape death from above.

Game Jam note:

The WebGL build that you can play in the browser is not super optimised, so if you run into some performance issues please try the downloads below instead. 💜

Controls: ActionsKeyboardGamepadMoveWASD, ZQSD or Left/right arrowsD-Pad or Left stickJumpSpace, Enter or Up arrowX or Square button (▢)DigE, Shift, or Down arrowA or Cross button (X)PauseEscapeStart button

We do recommend a controller if you have one :)

Credits:
  • Colin Bellino: programming, design ( https://colinbellino.com )
  • Laura De Pascale: Art, animation, design ( https://www.lauradp.work | https://twitter.com/la_depas)
  • PronomicalArtist: Music, audio, design (  https://twitter.com/PronomicalArt | https://soundcloud.com/calartist )
